name: @gus_hill/scaffolding
description: A package that helps creating directories and files out of templates. Useful for creating a initial project setup, or complex components in big projects.
author: Gustavo.Hillesheim

scripts.test: npm run test:e2e && npm run test:units
scripts.test:units:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch specs --exec "npm run test:units" -e ts
scripts.coverage: nyc -r text -e .ts --include src -x "tests/**/*.spec.ts" -x "src/di.ts" npm run test
scripts.coverage:html: nyc -r html -e .ts --include src -x "tests/**/*.spec.ts" -x "src/di.ts" npm run test
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
